resources.string: "When I look back, I am so impressed again with the life-giving power of literature. If I were a young person today, trying to gain a sense of myself in the world, I would do that again by reading, just as I did when I was young." – Maya Angelou
"If we encounter a man of rare intellect, we should ask him what books he reads." – Ralph Waldo Emerson
"A book is a dream that you hold in your hand." – Neil Gaiman
